data.what_is: Simple marketing automation, lead generation and lead management platform.
data.product_description: Simple marketing automation, lead generation and lead management platform.

alternatives.name: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Sun Bear All-in-One?
More leads turning into sales and referrals from new clients

What do you dislike about Sun Bear All-in-One?
That we have not had this software before such a great platform

Recommendations to others considering Sun Bear All-in-One:
Yes for an all in one crm def

What problems is Sun Bear All-in-One solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking progress with clients from start to finish
